attributes.action: Will government say how many people die within 28 days of having a Covid vaccine
attributes.additional_details: To present data which is fully representative of a matter of national importance.
attributes.background: Publish this data as it is in the public interest.

rejection.details:
Data on the total number of adverse reactions to approved Covid-19 vaccines, including events with a fatal outcome, is already being collected as part of the MHRA's yellow card scheme, and is reported at this link:
https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/coronavirus-covid-19-vaccine-adverse-reactions
